tishadow


the complete toolset for
rapid titanium app development

#reallyreallyfast

titanium + alloy

supports rapid deployment and testing of traditional titanium projects and alloy projects using any titanium sdk version

deploy

simultaneously live deploy and test across multiple real devices using any OS for development. #nomoresimulators

test

with jasmine bdd baked in, speed up your test iterations and start auto-testing your native mobile applications

npm install -g tishadow
